definitions.definition: A cross-connection between two blood vessels .
An interconnection between any two channels , passages or vessels .
The surgical creation of a connecting passage between blood vessels , bowels or other channels.
The insertion of one word within another, as in "underdarkneath" ( James Joyce ).

main_definition: A cross-connection between two blood vessels .
secondary_definitions: An interconnection between any two channels , passages or vessels .
( surgery ) The surgical creation of a connecting passage between blood vessels , bowels or other channels.
The insertion of one word within another, as in "underdarkneath" ( James Joyce ).
